columns.name: product_description
columns.description: A general description of the AMI.

columns.name: spot_price
columns.description: The maximum price per unit hour that you are willing to pay for a Spot Instance.

columns.name: create_timestamp
columns.description: The time stamp of the Spot price history.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The date and time, up to the past 90 days, from which to start retrieving the price history data.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The date and time, up to the current date, from which to stop retrieving the price history data.
